children.value: Ethereum is a blockchain designed to execute smart contracts and run decentralized applications.
The platform can be described as an open-source, public, permissionless, distributed ledger.
Smart contracts enable developers to build applications with business logic that execute in a trustless environment, while leveraging the high availability of the Ethereum network.
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Ethereum","order":0,"hideLanguageSelector":true,"keywords":"learn, ethereum, dai, defi, cryptocurrencies","description":"Learn about ethereum."}
